text: Antonio Sabàto Sr. (2 April 1943 – 10 January 2021) was an Italian-American actor. He was the father of model and actor Antonio Sabàto Jr. He was known for his roles in spaghetti western movies. His best known movies were One Dollar Too Many and Due volte Giuda. Sabàto Sr. died in Los Angeles on 10 January 2021 from COVID-19, aged 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Los Angeles Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Antonio Sabàto Sr.
